thread.section_title: New World Beijing Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing Hotel, amazing service
thread.title_full: Amazing Hotel, amazing service - Review of New World Beijing Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: mirelabg
title: Amazing Hotel, amazing service
text: New World is an amazing hotel - staff, facilities, convenience to metro station and proximity to Forbidden City and Tianamen Square are great. Food and the Executive Lounge really make guests to feel comfortable and taken care of. Spa and pools are meticulously maintained. I highly recommend the hotel when planning your trip to Beijing.
